## Repository List

### 1. Agentic Learning
- **URL:** https://github.com/bjpl/agentic_learning
- **Description:** Revolutionary autodidactic learning system powered by AI agent orchestration and consciousness evolution paradigms
- **Status:** Alpha
- **Tech Stack:** Node 18+, Claude Code, Flow Nexus
- **License:** MIT

### 2. Algorithms & Data Structures
- **URL:** https://github.com/bjpl/algorithms_and_data_structures
- **Description:** An innovative, dual-platform learning system that teaches algorithms and data structures through intuitive everyday analogies and interactive CLI experiences. Built using the SPARC methodology with Claude Code and multi-agent orchestration.
- **Status:** Active
- **Tech Stack:** Node.js 18+, Python 3.9+
- **License:** MIT

### 3. Aves
- **URL:** https://github.com/bjpl/aves
- **Description:** An AI-powered inductive learning platform for Spanish ornithological vocabulary acquisition through interactive photography
- **Status:** Active
- **Tech Stack:** React, AI integration
- **License:** TBD

### 4. Brandon JP Lambert Portfolio
- **URL:** https://github.com/bjpl/brandonjplambert
- **Description:** A sophisticated academic portfolio and educational resource platform built with Jekyll 4.3+, featuring bilingual support, Sveltia CMS integration, and an elegant academic design system. Fully deployable on GitHub Pages with zero external dependencies.
- **Status:** Active Maintenance
- **Tech Stack:** Jekyll 4.3+, TypeScript 5.9, Jest 30.1
- **License:** MIT
- **Live Site:** https://bjpl.github.io / https://brandonjplambert.com

### 5. California Puzzle Game
- **URL:** https://github.com/bjpl/california_puzzle_game
- **Description:** An interactive educational puzzle game for learning California geography. Players drag and drop county pieces to their correct locations on a California map using D3.js visualizations and React.
- **Status:** Active
- **Tech Stack:** React, D3.js, GitHub Pages
- **License:** TBD

### 6. Colombia Department Puzzle
- **URL:** https://github.com/bjpl/colombia_department_puzzle
- **Description:** An interactive educational puzzle game to learn all 33 departments of Colombia (32 departments + Bogot√° D.C.) through engaging drag-and-drop gameplay with multiple game modes and difficulty levels.
- **Status:** Active
- **Tech Stack:** React, D3.js
- **License:** TBD
